attributes.action: Provide better provision for health services in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Improve the NHS Service to a higher level than it is today with better funding and less red tape.

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition already online:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SavetheNHS/
If you want your own to be launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
